Text to display in the widget header. Change using msg.title.

Info text to display in (i) pop-up. Change using msg.popup_info.

Change using msg.enabled.

Value of selection to show in the box. Change using msg.payload.

Array of choices. Change using msg.choices.

Array of labels for choices. Change using msg.labels.

Change using msg.allow_multiple.

Background color of button. Change using msg.color.
